data.note: The amount for rural electrification is set in the country's budget. This is the 2016 total. The Rural Electrification Agency receives funding from international development partners in addition. Estimates are that no more than 20% is spent on off-grid.
data.name: Rural electrification budget

data.note: An estimate was provided by the African Development Bank which in local currency is ZMK 1,783,666 ($1800).
data.name: New connection cost
